website_summaries.verdict: This simple, one-button diffuser is valued by owners for its heavy mist and pleasant aromas.
pros: Could also serve as a personal humidifier

customer_reviews.title: I like this diffuser
customer_reviews.text: I like this diffuser, but it now makes a loud noise when I first turn it on. It takes a few minutes and then it gets quite again. I usually run it at night as we are going to sleep, but even the no light setting puts quite a bit of light off. My husband usually puts something around the base by the power button just to make it a little bit more dim in the room. I love that it shuts it self off when it runs low on water so I don't have to worry about it if I fall asleep before it is done.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: LOVE NOW BRAND.  This is a terrific diffuser.
customer_reviews.text: Works wonderfully, turns off automatically when empty. Use at night to defuse oils for sleep and it has modes that uses no light and turns off automatically which is a great feature for me. I have used this diffuser for over 5 months before I wrote this and am very pleased with this purchase no issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd and I gave them as Christmas gifts this year. Wonderful room-filling smell. It will fill the whole main level of my house w scent better than most candles I've tried. Its great for thr office too since there is no flame like a candle and i get compliments daily from co-workers about the scent since it reache down the hallway. It shuts off automatically and gives off a cool mist. The light setting to varying colors, single color or no light is great depending on my needs....night light or not. Can't say enough great things about this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Second one I've bought!
customer_reviews.text: I love this diffuser! I bought one 5 years ago and it's still going strong. I actually lost the power cord during a move. I tried a few universal cords to see if they'd fit, nothing. Then I thought of calling the manufacturer (I had it for several years, I didn't think they could help). It was so easy, they just asked for the information on the product and sent it for free! So when I needed it for another room, I didn't even wonder which one to get.
customer_reviews.author: Cici

customer_reviews.title: Crap diffuser, don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: This product has quit working and isn’t even 6 months old yet. It was working intermittently and then I realized it had leaked all the water out the bottom and all over my dresser. This is the 3rd now diffuser I’ve bought and non of them last. They are crap!
customer_reviews.author: Becki

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely loved this device
customer_reviews.text: At first, I absolutely loved this device! It was great and had the room smelling wonderfully within just a few minutes. However, by the second day, it wouldn't work properly, even after following the troubleshooting advice in the FAQ pamphlet enclosed. The mist wouldn't come out of the top, and cleaning it out didn't do anything. Unfortunately for me, I loved it so much on day 1 that I ordered another. When attempting to return the unopened/unused one, Amazon says it's not eligible for returns, so now I have two useless oil diffusers. Don't buy this product. Totally not worth it. Very disappointed because I had high hopes.
customer_reviews.author: Meridith K.

customer_reviews.title: Worked three days BEAUTIFULLY. Finally
customer_reviews.text: Worked three days BEAUTIFULLY. Finally, a diffuser that did not burn the oils. It stopped working completely after just three days. A light will flash now when I turn it on, but will NOT come on. No water was allowed to touch any of the electrical parts. I am soooo disappointed because I truly like this diffuser in every way. It is small, easy to use, and it worked. Well, for three days. I tossed my box so I doubt that I can return it. It was a gamble. We get what we pay for. I just threw away $33.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Would've been nice if it worked
customer_reviews.text: What a waste. I bought this because my friend who teaches at the same school as I do keeps her classroom smelling AMAZING with this EXACT same brand, make & model diffuser and hers has been going strong for almost 20 years. Mine stopped working after 3 weeks. And what do you know, beyond the return deadline. Second item I've bought on Amazon Prime that quit working within one month. Just going to have to start buying products directly from the manufacturer. This was probably just a refurbished one, definitely defective. Super disappointed in my Amazon Prime experience right now.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and perfect for a beginner. This is the first essential oil mister that I have ever purchased. It is cute and compact. What I love is the changing colors. If have a timer so you don’t have to worry about shutting it off. I would highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria

customer_reviews.title: This is a great diffuser for a good price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great diffuser for a good price. I have purchased 2 of them now and my only complaint and reason for minus 1 star is that after it's empty and automatically shuts off, something in the motor keeps running if it's plugged in and it will get kind of hot if you leave it plugged in. I am careful to always unplug it when I go to bed or leave the house. You can also tell something is running when you fill it with water - it will kind of bubble before turning it on. Seems a little dangerous. But otherwise, it's great. Ha.
customer_reviews.author: Raena Colby

customer_reviews.title: I love this little diffuser
customer_reviews.text: I love this little diffuser. I recently had to stay over night in a hospital and brought this with. I put lemon grass and orange oil in it. I must've had every nurse in my room from the 5th floor, they all said how wonderful my room smelled. It helped me get through the night, didn't smell like a hospital to me. It lasts about 4 hours I guess. Works better in a smaller area, at home I have open concept living room/dining area and you don't smell it as much because the room is very big. But you smell it within 10 feet of the diffuser. Lemongrass is my favorite so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jane P.

customer_reviews.title: Was on time.
customer_reviews.text: I’m happy about it, works well very easy to use. Just chose your favorite scent and then everything will go smoothly. Once it’s on you will see different colors. Very nice stuff. No complaints Thanks
customer_reviews.author: MF

customer_reviews.title: Very unhappy...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for 3 months and when I first received this, it worked perfectly. 2 weeks into using this, it started making a loud, vaccum-like noise. Now, it's been 3 months and this "noise" has been occurring very frequently. It's actually been happening everyday, to be exact. I'm very frustrated with this product. I clean the diffuser correctly after every use, I don't "over" use it at all. I'm usually an optimist with all things, but if I had a choice to give this product zero stars, I would.
customer_reviews.author: Niffy

customer_reviews.title: Great diffuser for the price
customer_reviews.text: My Young Living diffuser died on me three times, and of course they won't replace it. I did not want to spend the replacement price, so I looked on Amazon instead. This was rated well, and so far it does a great job for the price. It doesn't have the same diffusing capabilities as my YL diffuser, by that I mean that the mist doesn't go nearly as far into the air as the YL did. I would buy this again, it's probably a great diffuser for a bedroom (I use it in the kitchen.)
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Working great
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this almost every day at least an hour or 2 a day. So far it's running quite well. I am cleaning it with vinegar and a q-tip after every use, or at least wiping it out thoroughly. If I only do 4-5 drops I can't smell it in the larger part of the house, but my house is very open. In the bedrooms 4-5 drops of any oil is sufficient. The first night we had it I put lavender and ran it in our bedroom and the next morning I felt like it was the best sleep I'd had in awhile! I'm hoping this lasts quite awhile, which would make it great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: meganwin

customer_reviews.title: The one thing this thing does that I don't like is it will sometimes power itself up once the ...
customer_reviews.text: The one thing this thing does that I don't like is it will sometimes power itself up once the power connection is applied. This is a problem if you don't yet have it covered when you plug it in after cleaning it. It is a little awkward because you have to pick it up to plug the DC jack in and you will typically do this just after you have filled it with water so you have a high probability of spilling it. A power switch on the power line would have fixed this I think. Otherwise this machine seems to work quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Rothchild

customer_reviews.title: Pretty happy with its over all function
customer_reviews.text: 1st diffuser iv had. Bought because of rating reviews I found. Pretty happy with its over all function. Pretty quiet with a vwey slight bubbling noise. Changes color which is pretty neat or you can pick one color for it to be on. I rated it 4 stars because it says there is a non lighting function on it which is true in the light. However I use mine mostly at bedtime and with it on the nonlit it still glows bright blue in the dark because of the light on the power switch. It glows thru the whole unit.
customer_reviews.author: a.j.o.

customer_reviews.title: broke after 2 months, but has some good features
customer_reviews.text: This diffuser is just really sucky quality. It broke completely after 2 months of usage (I didn't even use it everyday) and it kept getting dusty/dirty for no reason and was impossible to clean the exterior. If it wasn't for that, I'd probably really like it. It has a nice blue nightlight perfect for a kids room to spy on them without turning on lights( a bit too bright for me to sleep with though). And also its very very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: I actually love this item
customer_reviews.text: I actually love this item, but after about three weeks of daily use the base has continued "pulsing" even when the item is off and the base is warm to the touch. I have to unplug it completely. I have tried cleaning it as instructed in the box, even left it unplugged and upside down for a couple days to make sure it isn't the result of water in the system, but it still continues... It is still completely usable, and I still enjoy it, I just have to remember to unplug it after use.
customer_reviews.author: LEB

customer_reviews.title: Really, like this but only goes about 4-6 hours
customer_reviews.text: I really like this. It is $44 at Sprouts so I was excited to get it for less. I works like a little humidifier that shoots out water vapor with the scent of what ever essential oil you place in the water. My only gripe is that is does hold that much water but I really like it. I just use a couple throughout the house. Not good for the bedroom as it has a little glow that could keep you up or it works at a night light if you need one. It only goes about six hours though so you can't really depend on having light as it will shut off.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I have purchased like this. I bought this one for a gift but absolutely love this product. Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: LMB

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't worth the money....
customer_reviews.text: 2 weeks in with the product and it worked great. It was easy to use & easy to clean. After 2 months of use I noticed the water bubbling when the unit wasn't turned on yet was plugged in. I had purchased 2 of these and knew this was not normal as the other diffuser did not do this. Upon further inspection I noticed a burn ring around the diffuser plate. The diffuser itself was hot as was the water. The other diffuser I have shuts off before the water runs out. I would look elsewhere for a diffuser.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great diffuser - if you get a lemon send it back for quick replacement.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd unit. First one was so good I purchased a 2nd one - second one was DOA and was quickly replaced. The replacement was as good as the first one and I am very happy with my purchase. I normally would deduct a star for the DOA but it was replaced quickly and I am 100% happy. If you get a unit that seems to leak from the bottom, just send it back before it self destructs.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Turner

customer_reviews.title: It was good while it lasted but very cheaply made. Lasted about 6 mos.
customer_reviews.text: Lasted about 6 months. It was good while it lasted but very cheaply made. There are much better versions out now, I've upgraded since & this was just a low cost starter version of what's available now.
customer_reviews.author: APositiveMind

customer_reviews.title: Covers a Large Area
customer_reviews.text: This is a great diffuser. The aroma from this device fills up most of my home. I have had people notice and comment on the aroma of my home without seeing the diffuser. I like that this can be filled passed the line with no issue. When I fill it passed the line, it puts out aroma for well over a day. I like that you can turn off the LED lights to save energy. You can not turn off the light for the power button. Sometimes the power button has issues, but this device has been going working well over four years.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Lattimore

customer_reviews.title: Broke the first day
customer_reviews.text: This product has too many problems. I love Now's oils and wanted to finally purchase one of their diffusers. first run-through went smoothly and everything worked perfectly. the next time I tried it, it refused to produce any steam and would not turn on (only producing a dull red light). Even after following all the instructions that's provided in the box if your diffuser doesn't work. nothing helped change the problem. unfortunately because of this, I can't reccomend this faulty product to anyone. Would have sent it back but had a better time smashing my $20 wasted dollars with a sledge hammer.
customer_reviews.author: Doe

customer_reviews.title: Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous to get this with the mixed reviews I read at the time but mine has worked fine! I have VERY hard water & it hasn't been a problem. If it doesn't want to diffuse right away I just take a paper towel & wipe the little metal plate really well again & it works fine! You do need to sit nearby to appreciate the fragrance. I've gotten brave & used citrus oils (it says not to) and as long as I rinse & paper towel immediately after use again it's still fine! Pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Adams

customer_reviews.title: Diffuser has a very limited life span
customer_reviews.text: The performance is erratic. Sometimes it uses all the water in a few hours, other times it goes on for days. I have cleaned it as directed and may be I get one use where it puts out enough mist to say it is working and the water evaporates in the intended time. Then I am back to it running and its not really putting out anything. The oil can not be smelled so it must not be getting warm enough. I don't think I would buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Fire Hazard!
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting this "used" product to operate normally, but after turning it on and allowing it to operate for a few hours, I discovered it would not automatically turn off! It turned out to be a fire hazard and seller does not allow returns. I will never buy a used product again.
customer_reviews.author: C Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil diffuser. I use it every night beside my bed and it runs for a good 8 hours before it runs out of water. Much longer than most I have seen. I love it so much, I bought another one for my living room. Only problem is that when you turn the light "off", it still has a rather bright glow. I have to cover it at night with a black cloth. It is not enough of a problem to make me say anything really "bad" about this product :)
customer_reviews.author: Bambi Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Beware, inferior product & poor customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I can't recommend this diffuser. It quit working 60 days after I began using it. I purchased it mid April 2015 and it worked great until it stopped in June. Just starting shutting off within a few seconds of turning it on. I had followed care instructions & rinsed it out after each use. I have called the company twice so far, leaving messages. I can't reach a live person. No call back. It's been two weeks. Too bad, I was enjoying using it. Fortunately I bought a different one for my guest room and have been using that one.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Price

customer_reviews.title: A piece of junk, really.
customer_reviews.text: It only last less than a month. I tried to return it through Amazon return center and it prompted me to contact the different department. It's really frustrating. I did so and I haven't got a reply. I guess I had to deal with it. It's still a ripoff even if it was listed for $10, not to mention $35!!! I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: YDR

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable?
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these in August. I like the size very much. The output isn't great for a very large room but placement really helps. I actually like this product very much except that within a month of use ONE of the two diffusers started being very noisy and the noise seems to be increasing. I'm wondering if I should continue to run it?! If I had only purchased the one (which continues to run quietly and without problem) I would have given this 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: avidreader

customer_reviews.title: Bad diffuser, cool light
customer_reviews.text: This sucks as an oil diffuser, but I kept it for the light. It does not diffuse oil well at all, I use youngliving oils and I wanted to get a smaller cheaper diffuser for our bedroom, you have to have your face right up in this to smell anything, or use A LOT of oil. I was going to send it back but the light is actually rather pleasant light for our room.
customer_reviews.author: AHarper

customer_reviews.title: Diffuser
customer_reviews.text: I have a diffuser that I really like, but I wanted to put it by my bed for nighttime diffusing. I purchased this one to put in the family room. We have been using it every day for 2 weeks and it is working out well for us. This would be a 5 star product if it had 30 second intervals, as my other one has, so that users could still get aromatherapy benefits while extending use time significantly. While this is my second favorite, it is by far better than any of the others I've seen.
customer_reviews.author: Woman by Grace

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I compared a few different ones and decided to purchase this one since it is cheapest. It is the only diffuser I've tried so I have nothing to compare it to, but it distributes the oils throughout the room with a large volume of mist. I can rinse it out and change oils with ease. I've had it about 2-3 months and no problems thus far. I recommend saving your money and purchasing THIS Now Foods Diffuser over the pricey diffusers found on Amazon. It gets the job done and is well made.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Loud! It’s a poor design
customer_reviews.text: It’s super loud! There are better diffusers on a market! NOT THIS ONE. Disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Knesh

customer_reviews.title: Love this diffuser
customer_reviews.text: This diffuser works better than some of its high end competition. I have had this for a couple years now. We use it several times a week. There is limited cleaning required and the light is just enough but does not interrupt sleep.Thank you for this great product at a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Okra Homestead

customer_reviews.title: Died in under 3 months
customer_reviews.text: We bought the unit end of February. As per other reviews it would stay on. I cleaned it many times that would help for awhile. Then the loud motor dying noise I got another month of use out of it. Tonight nothing no noise no light no nothing. We use the diffuser in kids room so our son was upset we have a different brand diffuser so fixed the problem for tonight. The poor machine did try but it died.
customer_reviews.author: homeschool mom of 4

customer_reviews.title: great diffuser
customer_reviews.text: Love this diffuser! Puts out a good, solid mist. My son prefers his to rotate colors, I prefer solid color, and my husband prefers lights off, so it has an option for us all. The only (small) issue is our house is sooo dry that it doesnt last near 4 hours before it shuts off. Which is fine based on the "hour on hour off" recommendation for aromatherapy, but inconvenient for overnight when i'd really prefer it to run a bit longer
customer_reviews.author: Srenee1988

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after just over a month of using daily
customer_reviews.text: I really like this for the first month we had it. I have it in my sons room and he loved the changing lights. Problem is that it just stopped working (won't turn on) one week after the 30 day return policy. Now I have a broken diffuser and cannot return. :( We bought 2 and the second one just stopped working this week! :( So one lasted about 45 days before the on button broke.
customer_reviews.author: DeeMonty

customer_reviews.title: OK diffuser, not as good as YL
customer_reviews.text: This does not give out as much vapor as my YL flower one does, but it is decent. Wanted another one for bedroom to diffuse lavender for better sleep (works for my hubby and me) so I could keep other one downstairs (yl one makes whole house smell) Gave this one to my daughter for her room. Works well for her, and she loves all the colors it cycles through. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: mother.jeni

customer_reviews.title: My wife likes it and now I do to. Glad the candles are gone.
customer_reviews.text: My wife was turned on to this by my sister. I figured it was a passing fad. We have now ditched the scented candles (they often caused me a sneezing fit). I really believe the alergy issues we had are not as bad now that we've switched. We use tap water, as suggested in the instructions, and not distilled water.
customer_reviews.author: Steven A. Maze

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a week
customer_reviews.text: Nice little diffuser. However, it stopped working after about a week. The item was non-returnable and the NOW customer service wasn’t very helpful. So I ended up buying another one.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: I loved it at first but am bummed 10months later it's broken and I'm out my $$
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for a few months but it never completely shuts off. It looks like it shuts off but it bubbles inside until the liquid dries up and still slightly runs. Even with remembering to unplug it most of the time it didn't even last 11 months! I loved it while it worked but and bummed I'm out of my $$.
customer_reviews.author: J. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: FIRE HAZARD! I was noticing the unit was very ...
customer_reviews.text: FIRE HAZARD! I was noticing the unit was very warm even when it wasn't turned on. I put it in my bedroom the other night and went downstairs to grab a bottle of oil to put in. I realized the unit was actually running and the water was bubbling when it was off! That means this was not turning off between uses and could have been a fire risk! I was wondering why this unit was not leaving ANY of the water after completion of the cycle as I've seen with other diffusers. Now I know that it was running 24 hours a day when I left it plugged in or overnight.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Works at first but disappointment will follow
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item April 5th so the window to return has closed. I'm sad as I loved this defuser when I first bought it. It worked rather well. Now, unfortunately, it no longer shuts off in four hours and it sometimes does not even defuse the oil and water. I wake up the next morning and it will still have the same amount if liquid as the night before meanwhile it was technically on and ran all night.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Hale

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the product but can't turn off with power button after a month
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for more than one month now, the diffuser creates decent amount of mist, is rather quiet and diffuess essential oil well. The only complaint is that lately the switch in the front no longer turns off the unit. It continues to produce small amount of mist even if the power button is off, so I have to unplug it to really turn it off.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Huang

customer_reviews.title: so-so
customer_reviews.text: I've had this now for five months and run it 1-3 times per week. It worked very well in the beginning but now, it doesn't seem to diffuse the oils like it used to. I buy good oils, and some are by NOW. I clean it regularly so I don't know why it just stopped working. I like that it's BPA free but I probably will not buy this same diffuser again.
customer_reviews.author: lacali

customer_reviews.title: Expectations were better than thought of!!
customer_reviews.text: I found this product to be up to part and work really well! I read reviews and decided to give it a try! I'm glad i did!! It brings a good aroma in any room used, depending on the oils used! I thought it filled the room and i was very impressed with it! For the size of it, i liked the results! EASY to use and Connect to!! It's still working after 4 or 5 months!! I will be buying more from this reseller in the future!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Abraham

customer_reviews.title: Potential fire hazard - some work better than others
customer_reviews.text: We bought several of these for use with doTerra essential oils. They diffuse well, and have the pretty lights that can be changed from bright to dim. Unfortunately, some of them from the first use and some from use after a few months did not shut off entirely/automatically as supposed to. When refilling water, with some I'd notice the water spritzing a bit. I'd also noticed a dark residue near the center on these same models after use. When touching the center metal, it was hot. This could potentially be a fire hazard. Basically hit or miss. Will contact the company to address the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Make A Difference

customer_reviews.title: Good model, plug in cord was defective but still working well thanks to cord from my old diffuser
customer_reviews.text: The plug-in cord was faulty and did not make a good connection with the diffuser. So it stopped working after only a week or so of using it. Fortunately I still have the cord from my old diffuser, which is the same model. Because of that, the diffuser is still working for me, and I hope this will continue.
customer_reviews.author: Marge

customer_reviews.title: It's ok oil diffuser
customer_reviews.text: Have to clean it frequently and doesn't cover much of space to really get that "oil diffused" experience.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Better buy than more expensive brand ones!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great diffuser! I have friends who have other brands that are more expensive but work EXACTLY the same! I love the light changing options, just a fun little feature. And it's great that I can turn it on and leave or go to sleep, as it automatically turns off when it's out of water.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Kubiszewski

customer_reviews.title: It is recommended to use a solution of vinegar and water
customer_reviews.text: Diffuses oils well. I usually use this at night while sleeping to help with my family's allergies. This helps tremendously. Other family members have had issues with theirs' not turning on. They have returned them and the new one works perfectly. Make sure to clean this after each use. If you use this all day, clean daily. It is recommended to use a solution of vinegar and water. That solution works very well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Chaely Andriakos

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy with this product and the warranty.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 4 of these and a lot of oil in the past year. 1 for myself and the other ones were given as gifts, I must say a little embarrassed that not only mine but another one that was given as a gift quite working. She was lucky enough that NOW replaced her base unit. Not sure about the others have not been told. NOW what do I do with all this oil?
customer_reviews.author: Tackout

customer_reviews.title: The price was great & the quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great diffuser, works just as great as the very expensive ones!!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Click

customer_reviews.title: I loved this product the first 5 months but a few ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product the first 5 months but a few weeks ago it started rattling and now I don't use it because its rattling so loudly I fear it will malfunction. And its annoying. The only original complaint I have it even when you supposedly turn the light off it is still quite bright in a dark room. So I usually prop up a packet of sticky notes against the light to shield it!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this two stars for their AWFUL customer service. I called because my unit sparked the other day and won't work again. I've done nothing different since March. They laughed and told me the most elaborate steps to clean it and hung up the phone. Poor customer service. Won't be doing business with Now Foods again.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Horse

customer_reviews.title: lasted 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Mine lasted about 3 months. Now, when I push the "on" button, the light will flash, but the unit won't turn on. Very disappointing. I found one I like much better from DoTERRA. Also, before it died, we noticed that if we left it plugged in while it was turned off, it still sometimes "bubbled" very slightly. The "bubbling" was like it was turned on but much less. I'm not sure how clear that is, but I'm wondering if that was a defect that I should have addressed when I first noticed it. I can't return it because it's been more than 30 days.
customer_reviews.author: SunshineState

customer_reviews.title: Great, I wished I had purchased the accompanying oils ...
customer_reviews.text: Great, I wished I had purchased the accompanying oils instead of an unfamiliar brand of which I requires double or even triple the amount needed for making the house smell great. Using the NOW oils makes a great difference in the diffusing ability of this machine, but that being said I don't really mind adding double the amount of the off-brand oils as I could purchase more of them to use anyway.
customer_reviews.author: iliketea

customer_reviews.title: Works Wonderful and Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: The first one I received was not working straight out of the box so I exchanged it. The second one works perfectly! I am so happy with this oil diffuser. The price is fantastic and I love diffusing organic essential oils around my apartment with this. It is easy to clean and easy to operate. I am so happy that I went with this diffuser!
customer_reviews.author: D.M.

customer_reviews.title: Diffuser did NOT work at all. Did NOT diffuse.
customer_reviews.text: Plug to electricity worked fine, heated water, had different lights and shut on/off, however, mist did NOT emit thru the top opening -- no matter what I tried. Hence, I called Amazon and they are refunding my payment.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne M. Sanders

customer_reviews.title: I loved it. However
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in Dec 2014, I loved it. However, now Sept 2015 my unit doesn't work anymore, I think it might be something with the cord I can see it light up when I first plug it in but it doesn't stay on. To be fair I used this a lot when I first received and then took a break over the summer so maybe sitting around and not using it has something to do with it not working anymore. I will be buying another brand this time.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Diffuser quit working after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this diffuser since it was recommended by a friend. It quit working after 6 months no matter what I try. I've cleaned it, used alcohol on the disk - nothing. I would NOT recommend purchasing this product.
customer_reviews.author: B. Callaway

customer_reviews.title: It's simple to use and works really well!
customer_reviews.text: This diffuser is great and is so easy to use. My favorite things about it is it uses tap water, can serve as a night light, it automatically cuts off when done. It there was one improvement I would want, it would be a bigger one so that it could last a little longer. I'm definitely considering buying another one.
customer_reviews.author: Littlehalle

customer_reviews.title: This product works great for the bedrooms in my house
customer_reviews.text: This product works great for the bedrooms in my house. I like the different light settings. I will say that if you are using this for a bedroom at night, even with the color in the cone turned off the light from the on/off button is really bright and I have to cover it up. other wise the product works great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Ferrol Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Purchased 2 of these diffusers. Delivered in same box ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 of these diffusers. Delivered in same box. 1 base worked, the other did worked. The next day neither was not working. I called the CS number, they sent me 2 replacement bases, both are working but I just hope they could put out more of the fragrance. I would not order this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I found out about this product through a friend! When I saw bad reviews on it about how it didn't last long, I talked to my friend and she said she has had it for a year and it still works as well as it did when she first used it. I ordered this a month ago and I'm so glad I did. The only thing I would recommend is to make sure you look at the cleaning instructions and clean it after every use.
customer_reviews.author: Mia Shami

customer_reviews.title: Good unit, and the NOW customer service is top-notch!
customer_reviews.text: No issues with our replacement, but needed to send the 1st one back, as the motor was incredibly loud. Obviously there was something wrong with that one, but the NOW customer service was fast and good, they sent us a new one, stat! Recommended! It works as you would expect, and makes for a nice night light in a kids room as well.
customer_reviews.author: C. Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: I like the ease of use
customer_reviews.text: I like the ease of use, only one lid part to deal with. For my kids' rooms they are great as they like to have a light on. For my room I chose a different brand because even with the light function off, there is still a blue glow that i think is just from the power button, but it was brighter than I like. We've had two of these for over a year and they are still working great.
customer_reviews.author: Abbey Ater

customer_reviews.title: we love it
customer_reviews.text: Works great and calming. be careful when you clean and if it gets over wet inside and stops working just let it dry out over night and try again.I don't like the opening that allows water to run in when dumping it out and cleaning but as long as it keeps working I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Mom of 6

customer_reviews.title: One thing I really don't like about it is that you can not completely shut ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent little diffuser for the price. It stopped shutting off about six weeks after I started using it. I called the 800 number on the box and they immediately sent a new base. One thing I really don't like about it is that you can not completely shut the lights off. If you are bothered by lights at night it can't be used in the bedroom because it gives off to much light.
customer_reviews.author: Ms G

customer_reviews.title: Good So Far...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this diffuser for my mom for Christmas and she loves it! She is always telling me how much she likes it. I am thinking about buying one for myself now! She hasn't had it a really long time so I can't say that it won't have issues like many of the other people who have bought it but at least for now she is very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Shan

customer_reviews.title: 1st time it...
customer_reviews.text: 1st time plugged in it made noise and got a little worst. Did not know you had to clean it each day. But it should have not been so loud. Did not want to spend time sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: fretchick

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I love this diffuser because it's super easy to use. Take the top off, pour 1/2 cup water, add drops of oil, or to back on, turn on. Easy! And it folks my kitchen and front room easily with no noise. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this diffuser. Much better price than the ones offered by DoTerra and Young Living. It really works best in a smaller room, but it can work in a larger room with stronger oils. I'm the only one in the house that really uses it and it's great for my personal use! I also love the colors!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki M

customer_reviews.title: Product failure. Poor customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Product was fine until it started making a noise. Customer service is the worst I've ever dealt with. I called on two different occasions and was told my call would be returned within 24 hours. Not so. The second call was a week later and I was told they would email instructions on cleaning. If that didn't work they would proceed from there. I have yet to receive the email. I might add that I followed the manuals instructions on cleaning the machine. What else could be done to stop the noise if I already followed their instructions? I guess I'll have to buy a different product.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I Love this product.... Use it almost everyday. Works great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rafal R.

customer_reviews.title: Affordable diffuser
customer_reviews.text: Affordable diffuser, it works as advertised. Every once in a while it makes a vibration noise that is unusual. I love the lights and how it changes colors!
customer_reviews.author: Holly Jury

customer_reviews.title: I can not say enough about this easy to use and incredibility fast working diffuser
customer_reviews.text: I can not say enough about this easy to use and incredibility fast working diffuser. In the past I have used other diffuser options but this not only safe, as soon as you plug it in it starts working. Additionally it shuts off once the water has run out.
customer_reviews.author: John L

customer_reviews.title: Not a long lasting diffuser.
customer_reviews.text: This worked perfectly! WorkED. As many other reviews state; it will die on you some day. Mine quit working only one month after purchase, which made me return it and get the Zaq Mirage. So far the Mirage is a great diffuser; but it hasn't been a month yet.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this diffuser. I put cinnamon bark with water every night. And have gotten great results with my autistic son. The lighting is very colorful and he loves to watch it. It's not to bright so u can fall sleep with it on. If u put a half cup of water with about 5 drops of oil. It runs about four hours. Very quiet so no noise to worry about. A very good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Milam

customer_reviews.title: Love my diffuser
customer_reviews.text: Love my diffuser, i pd almost 3 times the price of this same exact one in a local store. Then saw the price on this one, returned the expensive one & ordered this one & haven't had any problems with it. It runs for a long time without needed to be refilled so often & my 2 yr old loves the changing lights ;)
customer_reviews.author: April Touchet

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This item worked for exactly 3 weeks. Amazon's return window is already closed.
customer_reviews.author: Garth Ellelfson

customer_reviews.title: Light came on but it would not diffuse. Even ...
customer_reviews.text: Light came on but it would not diffuse. Even turned off after a few seconds. Had to return. The bamboo one of this brand worlds greag though (I have 2).
customer_reviews.author: TXShell

customer_reviews.title: good diffuser
customer_reviews.text: I had this diffuser for a couple of years before it wore completely out. I was glad to still find the same model. Easy to use. Dome lifts right off, put in the water and oil and you are done.
customer_reviews.author: tml

customer_reviews.title: I did A LOT of research before purchasing this diffuser and would still pick this one again.
customer_reviews.text: It works great and is easy to use. The only complaint I have is that I have to unplug it when not in use even though it has an automatic shut off. It continues to be hot and burns around the element. It's very easy to clean and despite my one complaint I plan on buying another for work and another to have around the house.
customer_reviews.author: SLC

customer_reviews.title: it just doesnt have as strong of a smell after like four or so hours
customer_reviews.text: mine runs more than 8 Hours. it just doesnt have as strong of a smell after like four or so hours.i GIVE IT A 10/10 for the money . Best investment
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Seemed like a good deal, but isn't working...
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive my diffuser today after reading so many positive reviews. It worked great when I first plugged it in, but only stayed on for less than 5 minutes. It was making a nice mist & the smell was nicely dispersed in the cool mist. I am so disappointed & will be calling customer service tomorrow & asking for a replacement. I'm hoping it is just a faulty unit...will edit my review if I get a working diffuser replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle W.

customer_reviews.title: Now Foods Ultrasonic Oil Diffuser
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Very convenient but doesn't really seem to carry the smell far :( I don't think it can really help much unless you stay right by it or have a very small space for it's use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Returning, not safe?
customer_reviews.text: after two weeks realized it remains hot after automatically turned off. as I may not remember to unplug after each use, it did not seem safe. Also, when refilling (and plugged in) it acted as though it was "on" although the controls were off. After waiting a week for response from company customer service, returning for a refund. disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: consumer in virginia

customer_reviews.title: Now Foods Ultrasonic Oil Diffuser
customer_reviews.text: love love love this!! I use "Blunt effects" spray in this one or two drops, it perfumes up my whole house and people tell me when they walk to my house from the side walk, they can smell it from there!!
customer_reviews.author: Suzy

customer_reviews.title: Quit working within 3 weeks!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased one before that was perfect. Was a little on the louder side compared to other diffusers. Ordered another one and it wont put out any mist. Eventually turns itself off. Ans of course, I can't return it. What a wasts!
customer_reviews.author: Meagan

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't be more satisfied. This is a great diffuser to begin your ...
customer_reviews.text: I am very new to the world of essential oils but for my first diffuser and trial period of using oils to reduce anxiety and help with sleep, I couldn't be more satisfied. This is a great diffuser to begin your oils journey with.
customer_reviews.author: Canesfan27

customer_reviews.title: It Works I guess.
customer_reviews.text: The oil diffuser works I guess, as I have nothing as a guide to show how high the vapors rise. Also, the bottom edge of the top was chipped when I opened the package, the pieces were in the packing. The top does have nice colors, it is very quiet. If you place the diffuser on a nice piece of furniture, the vapor cloud will fall on the furniture and remove the finish.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Adams

customer_reviews.title: This is one of my favorite diffusers I've used since it puts out a soft ...
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite diffusers I've used since it puts out a soft amount if mist for a long period of time, however it now makes a super loud grinding sound after turning out which concerns me that it is about to break down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: She put any good essential oils
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for may daughter. The moment it arrived it was a big success. She is a midwife and uses it during her patient's birthing process everyone loves it. She put any good essential oils, for relaxing, stuffy nose, congestion and many more situations. highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Zulma

customer_reviews.title: Tried and True
customer_reviews.text: This is by far one of my favorite diffusers. I try others and keep going back to this one. It lasts forever and does the job. I’ve purchased 5 over the years for work, home, and gifts.
customer_reviews.author: jay

customer_reviews.title: Here today, Gone tomorrow :/
customer_reviews.text: I fell in love with this diffuser. The multi changing lights, the option to choose a color and also the nightlight feature. It only lasts a few hours and this is the second one I purchased in a 4 month period! They just don't seem to last long.
customer_reviews.author: Lala

product_meta.title: NOW Essential Oils, Ultrasonic Aromatherapy Oil Diffuser, Extremely Quiet, Heat Free and Easy to Clean, Color Changing LED Diffuser
product_meta.description:
NOW Solutions Ultrasonic Oil Diffuser unites scientific innovation with contemporary design to create an essential oil diffuser that's the perfect complement to your home or office. This attractive diffuser is BPA-free and utilizes high-frequency ultrasonic electrical vibrations to create an ultra-fine aromatherapy mist. This diffusion method doesn't utilize heat, which maintains essential oil integrity and holistic properties. It's perfect for daily and year-round use and is a healthy alternative to synthetic room fresheners and scented candles.

MANUFACTURER CONTACT INFORMATION
Customer support : 888-548-0400
feature_bullets: Just add tap water and essential oils
Extremely quiet and easy to clean
Cool steam / no heat involved / no risk of burns

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
